effect.shortEffect: Prevents infatuation and protects against captivate.
effect.full: This Pokémon cannot be infatuated and is immune to captivate. If a Pokémon is infatuated and acquires this ability, its infatuation is cleared.

description.diamond-pearl: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming infatuated.
description.platinum: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming infatuated.
description.x-y: Keeps the Pokémon from being infatuated or falling for taunts.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Keeps the Pokémon from being infatuated or falling for taunts.
description.sun-moon: The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.
description.sword-shield: The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.
